metadata.title: CVE-2023-39235 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple out-of-bounds write vulnerabilities exist in the VZTvzt_rd_process_block autosort functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A speciallycrafted .vzt file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would needto open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the out-of-bounds write when looping over`lt->num_time_ticks`.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
